---
title: "SolveCaptchaAction"
description: "Solve a captcha"
---

IMPORTANT: always use this action if you notice a captcha that needs to be solved on the current page. Try to resolve the captcha type to the best of your ability, but return unknown if you can't.

**Example:**
```python
from notte_core.actions import SolveCaptchaAction
# Dict syntax
session.execute({"type": "solve_captcha", "captcha_type": "cloudflare_fullpage"})
session.execute({"type": "solve_captcha", "captcha_type": "unknown"})
# Pydantic syntax
session.execute(SolveCaptchaAction(captcha_type="cloudflare_fullpage"))
session.execute(SolveCaptchaAction(captcha_type="unknown"))
```

## Fields

<ParamField path="type" type="Literal['solve_captcha']" default="solve_captcha">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="category" type="str" default="Special Browser Actions">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="description" type="str" default="Solve a captcha. IMPORTANT: always use this action if you notice a captcha that needs to be solved on the current page. Try to resolve the captcha type to the best of your ability, but return unknown if you can&#x27;t">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="captcha_type" type="Literal['recaptcha', 'cloudflare_embed', 'cloudflare_fullpage', 'perimeterx', 'human_security', 'akamai', 'datadome', 'imperva', 'aws_waf', 'kasada', 'geetest', 'funcaptcha', 'unknown']" required>
</ParamField>


## Module

`notte_core.actions`
